menu_prompt: What do you want to do today?
menu_reprompt: What do you want to do?
menu_prompt_retry: I didn't understand you. Can you choose from these?
menu_prompt_cancel: Maybe it's not the right time for a conversation. Let's try again later!
menu_repeat_prompt: Do you want to do something else?
menu_trigger: This will take you back to the menu. Are you sure?
